Pallium of CIVM postnatal rat brain atla.SuperCategory: CIVM postnatal rat brain atlas parcellation scheme region
Pallium of CIVM postnatal rat brain atla.Is part of: Telencephalon of CIVM postnatal rat brain atlas
Pallium of CIVM postnatal rat brain atla.Definition: The pallium is a superparcellation consisting of the hippocampal formation, the isocortex and the olfactory structures.
